nodes.text: Talivar was a location where Flix's mother lived. After the First Order occupied the Colossus station, Flix and Orka attempted to escape by arranging for themselves, Bitey and G-LN to be shipped to Talivar inside a large crate. However, the sinking of the Colossus prevented that plan.
Talivar was first mentioned in the Star Wars Resistance episode "No Escape: Part 1."
